xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: A module for a Contextual Query Language (CQL) parser

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: cqlparser:parse-cql
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: cqlparser:parse-cql($expression as xs:string?, $output-as as xs:string?) as item()?

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Parses expressions in the Contextual Query Language (SRU/CQL) v1.2, returning it back as XCQL or CQL, based on the second parameter, default is XCQL. Basic searchClauses (index relation term) can be combined with boolean operators.
